content: wtfsayo: Focused on strengthening infrastructure and database reliability, notably delivering a major overhaul to the SQL plugin in elizaos/eliza (#6323) that introduced pool configurations and error handling across thousands of lines of code. They also modernized the CI pipeline by upgrading Claude workflows to Opus 4.5 and enabling bot-triggered automation (#6324, #6328). Their work this week primarily centered on critical bug fixes and configuration management, significantly improving the stability of the project's data layer and development workflows.
